reqs: BA MUSC majors and all MUSC minors must email the MUSC Advisor at music.advisor@ubc.ca to register. Students ineligible to register for this class without instructor permission, should register for the WAITING LIST MUSC 120 1W1. If you have difficulty registering, email the MUSC Advisor at music.advisor@ubc.ca. Must read music.
description: An overview of Western music from antiquity through the Middle Ages and Renaissance, providing a framework for understanding musical styles and practices, and examining selected compositions in greater analytical and historical depth.
